prompts.prompt: A vibrant, hopeful community scene showing diverse people receiving harm reduction services in a mobile outreach setting. Warm, welcoming atmosphere with magenta, cyan, lime, and yellow accent colors. Professional, modern, compassionate healthcare setting. High quality, photorealistic.
prompts.negative_prompt: drugs, needles, violence, dark, scary, clinical

prompts.prompt: Mobile harm reduction RV in an urban community setting, with diverse outreach workers distributing naloxone kits and health resources. Bright daylight, professional healthcare workers in safety vests, welcoming and accessible atmosphere. Vibrant colors: magenta, cyan, lime accents. Photorealistic, high quality.
prompts.negative_prompt: drugs, needles, violence, clinical hospital, sterile

prompts.prompt: Compassionate healthcare worker providing harm reduction education and naloxone training to community members. Warm, professional, supportive atmosphere. Modern community health setting with vibrant accent colors (magenta, cyan, lime). Focus on connection, empathy, and life-saving resources. Photorealistic.

Healthcare professional demonstrating naloxone nasal spray usage in a bright, welcoming community health setting. Educational, professional, compassionate. Clean, modern illustration style with magenta and cyan accent colors. Focus on training and life-saving education.

Organized harm reduction supply kit with naloxone, fentanyl test strips, educational materials, and health resources laid out professionally. Clean, bright, organized presentation. Modern healthcare supplies with vibrant accent colors. Educational and professional.

Mobile harm reduction outreach van/RV with welcoming signage, parked in urban community. Healthcare workers greeting community members. Bright daylight, professional, accessible, welcoming atmosphere. Vibrant colors with magenta and cyan accents. Modern, clean, hopeful.

Small group community education session about harm reduction and overdose prevention. Diverse attendees listening to healthcare educator. Welcoming community space, warm lighting, supportive atmosphere. Modern, professional, compassionate. Vibrant accent colors.

Diverse group of community members of different ages, ethnicities, and backgrounds coming together in support. Warm, welcoming, hopeful atmosphere. Modern community setting with natural lighting. Focus on connection, mutual aid, and community strength. Vibrant colors.

Volunteers organizing harm reduction supplies and preparing for community outreach. Collaborative, organized, professional setting. Warm lighting, diverse volunteers working together. Modern community health space with vibrant accent colors (magenta, cyan, lime).

Two people in supportive conversation at a community health center. Warm, compassionate atmosphere. Natural lighting, comfortable seating area. Focus on connection, empathy, and peer support. Professional but welcoming setting. Vibrant, hopeful colors.

Abstract flowing shapes representing hope, healing, and community connection. Vibrant gradients of magenta, cyan, lime, and yellow. Smooth, organic forms suggesting growth and positive change. Modern, optimistic, uplifting. High quality digital art.

Abstract representation of interconnected community network. Flowing lines and nodes in vibrant magenta, cyan, and lime colors. Organic, warm, welcoming visual suggesting support systems and mutual aid. Modern digital art, high quality.
